shadow010.description: Default states of cards and active states of buttons

shadow040.description: Hover states of cards and button hover states

inkBrand010.description: Prominent brand colour applied to text and icons (e.g. icons in outlined buttons)

inkInformative.description: Text and icons for informative messages

inkNotice.description: Text and icons for notice messages

inkNegative.description: Text and icons for error messages. Feedback notifications (invalid) (e.g. assistive text in a text field)

inkPositive.description: Text and icons for success messages. Feedback notifications (valid) (e.g. assistive text in a text field)

inkDark010.description: Used when the same dark colour value is required across all colour themes

inkLight010.description: Used when the same light colour value is required across all colour themes

inkInverse.description: Text and icons where the recommended contrast against the background cannot be achieved

inkNonEssential.description: Text and icons in an inactive (disabled) state

interfaceSkeleton020.description: Background (low contrast in a light theme, and high contrast in a dark theme) to indicate the skeleton (loading) state of a component

interfaceSkeleton010.description: Background (high contrast in a light theme, and low contrast in a dark theme) to indicate the skeleton (loading) state of a component

interfaceNeutral020.description: Background (low contrast in a light theme, and high contrast in a dark theme) for neutral messages

interfaceNeutral010.description: Background (high contrast in a light theme, and low contrast in a dark theme) for neutral messages, & feedback notifications (e.g. banner, flag, inline message)

interfaceInformative020.description: Background (low contrast in a light theme, and high contrast in a dark theme) for informative messages

interfaceInformative010.description: Background (high contrast in a light theme, and low contrast in a dark theme) for informative messages

interfaceNotice020.description: Background (low contrast in a light theme, and high contrast in a dark theme) for notice or warning messages

interfaceNotice010.description: Background (high contrast in a light theme, and low contrast in a dark theme) for notice or warning messages

interfaceNegative020.description: Background (low contrast in a light theme, and high contrast in a dark theme) for error messages

interfaceNegative010.description: Background (high contrast in a light theme, and low contrast in a dark theme) for error messages

interfacePositive020.description: Background (low contrast in a light theme, and high contrast in a dark theme) for success messages

interfacePositive010.description: Background (high contrast in a light theme, and low contrast in a dark theme) for success messages

interfaceBrand010.description: Prominent brand colour applied to backgrounds e.g. a footer, or header

interactiveInput050.description: Active state background and border for selection controls, and input components

interactiveInput010.description: Background colour applied to the hover state of the text field, & the select component button, & the list item
